item.title: APlayer - 一个简洁的HTML播放器
item.description: 上次在emlog插件中心闲逛的时候， 无意间看到一个叫APlayer的播放器插件，并追到了它的临时官网 下载源码 用npm下载： npm install aplayer --save 用Yarn下载： yarn add aplayer 来自官网的Quick Start HTML: <link rel="stylesheet" href="APlayer.min.css"> <div id="aplayer"></div> <script src="APlayer.min.js"></script> Javascript: const ap = new APlayer({ container: document.getElementById('aplayer'), audio: [{ name: 'name', artist: 'artist', url: 'url.mp3', cover: 'cover.jpg' }] }); Work with module bundler: import 'aplayer/dist/APlayer.min.css'; import APlayer from 'aplayer'; const ap = new APlayer(options); 一个萌萌的example： const ap = new APlayer({ container: document.getElementById('player'), mini: false, autoplay: false, theme: '#FADFA3', loop: 'all', order: 'random', preload: 'auto', volume: 0.
